enhanced_by.reason: The maxSize method is often used in conjunction with the isFull method to determine if a collection is full based on its maximum size.
The maxSize method is related to the addIgnoreNull method as both deal with the state and size of the collection.
The maxSize method returns the maximum size of a collection, which can be compared with the current size of the collection using the size method.
Both maxSize and isFull methods are used to determine the capacity and fullness of a collection, making them similar in behavior.
